item.title: Cannabis blunts back pain in 2 new studies

item.title: Grab the goggles. Pickleball eye injuries are on the rise
item.description: Safety precautions haven't caught up with enthusiasm for the sport. Researchers call for a new push for eye-ware.

item.title: For four years she hid her Parkinson's diagnosis. Then she let a reporter follow her journey.
item.description: Dr. Sue Goldie and New York Times reporter John Branch recount how a private, years-long conversation about her Parkinson's became a public story.
